# GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/searchKeywords | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

-  GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/searchKeywords 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/searchKeywords

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-searchKeywords#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/searchKeywords
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-searchKeywords#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-searchKeywords#query-parameters)

`fields[appKeywords]``[string]`

 Possible Values: ```filter[locale]``[string]`

`filter[platform]``[string]`

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-searchKeywords#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppKeywordsResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appkeywordsresponse)`OK`
